org.apache.flex.swf

Interface ISWF

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SWF

    public interface ISWF
    SWF model interface. The properties include fields in SWF header, FileAttributes tag and optionally Metadata tag.

      • getMetadata

        String getMetadata()
        Get the Metadata text. This is a Metadata property.

        The Metadata tag is an optional tag to describe the SWF file to an external process. The tag embeds XML metadata in the SWF file so that, for example, a search engine can locate this tag, access a title for the SWF file, and display that title in search results.

        Returns:
        metadata XML text; null if Metadata tag doesn't exit.

      • setMetadata

        void setMetadata(String value)
        Set the Metadata text. This is a Metadata property.

        The Metadata tag is an optional tag to describe the SWF file to an external process. The tag embeds XML metadata in the SWF file so that, for example, a search engine can locate this tag, access a title for the SWF file, and display that title in search results.

        Setting a non-null value will also set FileAttributes.hasMetadata to true.

        Parameters:
        value - Metadata XML string; null value will remove the Metadata tag on the SWF.

      • hasMetadata

        boolean hasMetadata()
        Check if the SWF has Metadata tag. This is a FileAttributes property.
        Returns:
        true if the SWF has Metadata tag

      • getUseAS3

        boolean getUseAS3()
        Check if the SWF uses ActionScript3. This is a FileAttributes property.
        Returns:
        true if the SWF uses ActionScript3

      • setUseAS3

        void setUseAS3(boolean value)
        Set whether the SWF uses ActionScript3. This is a FileAttributes property.
        Parameters:
        value - true if the SWF uses ActionScript3

      • getScriptLimits

        ScriptLimitsTag getScriptLimits()
        Get the managed ScriptLimits tag.
        Returns:
